*div1 type="summary"* *p*Mary Austin Holley to Austin [New Orleans], June 8, 1832. Delay in publication of her " Texas." Estimate of Austin, Influence against slavery*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[New Orleans], *date_mentioned n="06-08-1832">June 8, 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Cousin*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I can not go hence without writing to you, if but a line, at once of adieu and welcome. I shall soon be on my way to *location_mentioned*Kentucky*/location_mentioned*, while you I hope are not far from your cherished *location_mentioned*home*/location_mentioned*. I rejoice to hear, as by last accounts, that your health and prosperity are so flattering and pray God that you may be blessed in all things.*/p*
*p*Our book is not out yet that I know of The late political disturbances in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*caused such a panic in *location_mentioned*New York*/location_mentioned*, that everything was at a stand. I hope it will be no disadvantage in the end, as they say it will not. In the mean time all *location_mentioned*Europe */location_mentioned*is in commo- tion with wars and rumors of wars cholera etc. Despotism is seeking its last vengeance in *location_mentioned*Spain */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Poland*/location_mentioned*, it is to be hoped. In consequence *person_mentioned*immigrants */person_mentioned*are thronging to this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*. Where can they find such an asylum as *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*offers? How prophetic were your views! With you, I am heartily sick of the *location_mentioned*old world*/location_mentioned* and all its doings—the great tyrannies and the little ones. Pray be firm against slavery. I witness such cruelties as fill me with abhorrence of myself and my species. How I long for our peaceful and simple and quiet life, where we will admit no debasing passions. I will not aim at too much and I can not be disappointed. My personal wants are few. My plan for a *location_mentioned*school */location_mentioned*is drawn up, but at the present it shall remain in my escritoire.*/p*
*p*I can not forbear to give you an extract from a letter of *person_mentioned*Orville Holley*/person_mentioned* about my work. He says, " I intirely agree with you in your appreciation of *person_mentioned*Stephen Fuller Austin*/person_mentioned*'s character. He is to be ranked among the *person_mentioned*founders of *location_mentioned*Commonwealths*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, intrepid, interprizing, benevolent and just—a man of sense and soul. I am not only pleased, but proud to be friendly and respectfully remembered by such a man; and it will be among the many grateful considerations connected with whatever I may be able to do in the matter of this book, that it may serve in some degree to promote his just and sacred interests." He says he has half a mind to emigrate himself, supposing he could fix in some *location_mentioned*prairie*/location_mentioned*, where he could gather his own eggs, and after learning the bee business take his own honey etc., etc.*/p*
*p*I mean to return here in *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1832">October */date_mentioned*when I will arrange the details for further operations. I can not now regulate everything, nor tell the moment of my going to the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*. But I assure you, my [dear] *person_mentioned*cousin*/person_mentioned*, that it will be at the first moment I am able, for there is nothing I so ardently long for— In the mean time the happiness of being once more with my dear *person_mentioned*children */person_mentioned*will absorb me. If they were in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*and I with them, I should not have a wish. My health is very good. May all happiness attend you—remember me kindly to your *person_mentioned*sister */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Your *person_mentioned*cousin */person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*M A H*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Hubbard */person_mentioned*has his passport—He and *person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*are well—*/p* *p*[Addressed:] " *person_mentioned*Col: S F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned* San Felipe de Austin Texas. Brazoria*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
